AraMod:Jellybeans.NAME: Jellybeans
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, randomly gain #b1 temporary #yStrength, #yDexterity, or #yFocus.

AraMod:NuclearReactor.NAME: Nuclear Reactor
AraMod:NuclearReactor.FLAVOR: Produces awe-inspiring sights! Enables you to actually SEE the paths of electrons and alpha particles traveling at speeds of more than 10,000 miles per SECOND! ~ The  Gilbert U-238 Atomic Energy Lab
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] [E] at the start of each turn. On turn #b12, die.

AraMod:PocketApothecary.NAME: Pocket Apothecary
AraMod:PocketApothecary.FLAVOR: It's like a drinking game, but with more explosions.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, use all potions. At the end of combat, fill all potion slots with random potions.

AraMod:RabbytsFoot.NAME: Rabbyt's Foot
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain 1 #yaramod:Fast.

AraMod:FuseBox.NAME: Fuse Box
DESCRIPTIONS: All #yStrikes also apply #b3 #yaramod:Electrified.

AraMod:MidasKnob.NAME: Midas Knob
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play a #ySkill, gain #b1 #yGold.

AraMod:MidasCore.NAME: Midas Core
DESCRIPTIONS: When you #yChannel an orb, gain #b7 #yGold.

AraMod:BeltOfGluttony.NAME: Belt of Gluttony
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, lose #r30% max HP. Whenever a non-minion enemy dies, gain #b1 max HP.

AraMod:LostWallet.NAME: Lost Wallet
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, gain #b200 #yGold.

AraMod:BlanksHoodie.NAME: Blank's Hoodie
DESCRIPTIONS: When a card is played, deal #b2 damage to all enemies.

AraMod:BrokenPillar.NAME: Broken Pillar
DESCRIPTIONS: Later.

AraMod:Lemon.NAME: Lemon
AraMod:Lemon.FLAVOR: When life gives you citrus fruit...
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, gain #b5 max HP. At the start of combat, upgrade a random card in your hand.

AraMod:SmashedLemon.NAME: Smashed Lemon
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, gain #b10 max HP. At the start of each turn, upgrade a random card in your hand.

AraMod:ChunkOfWall.NAME: Chunk of Wall
AraMod:ChunkOfWall.FLAVOR: Very heavy, but worth the effort.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of each turn, gain block equal to your #yDexterity.

AraMod:ButchersCleaver.NAME: Butcher's Cleaver
DESCRIPTIONS: On the first turn of combat, gain #yTemporary HP equal to the damage you deal.

AraMod:ReadiedClaws.NAME: Readied Claws
DESCRIPTIONS: Each time you plan an attack, gain #b2 temporary #yThorns.

AraMod:AmuletOfProtection.NAME: Amulet of Protection
AraMod:AmuletOfProtection.FLAVOR: Carved in the shape of a Scaryb.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #b2 #yMalleable.

AraMod:ShatteredShield.NAME: Shattered Shield
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, gain #b1 #yPlated #yArmor.

AraMod:DefectiveTurbocharger.NAME: Defective Turbocharger
AraMod:DefectiveTurbocharger.FLAVOR: Now, let's start out easy...wOAH!!! TOO FAST!!! TOO FAST!!!
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with #r-30 #yStrength and #b5 #yRitual.

AraMod:StatueOfPride.NAME: Statue of Pride
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of combat, heal #g1 HP for each relic you have, excluding this one

AraMod:IronRibcage.NAME: Iron Ribcage
AraMod:IronRibcage.FLAVOR: You hide behind your armor; I AM my armor!
DESCRIPTIONS: While your hp is at or below 50%, you have #b
additional #yDexterity.
